desc: An independent probe will explore whether there was a "missed opportunity" to prevent six deaths caused by a landslide in New Zealand.

title: EU, India agree on ‘mother of all’ trade deals
desc: The agreement will cut or eliminate tariffs on almost 97% of European exports, saving up to €4 billion annually in duties.

title: African Philosopher Praises Military Rule, Dismisses Democracy as ‘Smokescreen’

title: Vice President has chosen Haruna Iddrisu as her running mate for 2028 elections - Afenyo-Markin
desc: The Minority Leader of Parliament, Alexander Afenyo-Markin, has alleged that Vice President Professor Naana Jane Opoku-Agyemang has chosen the Minister of Education, Haruna Iddrisu, as her running mate ahead of the 2028 general elections.
